layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x120
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x120
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x96
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 213x19
          text run at (0,0) width 213: "There should be a green bar below:"
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,36) size 120x60 [color=#FFFFFF]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 100x20
          text run at (0,0) width 100: "xx xx"
        LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 40x20 [color=#008000]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,20) size 40x20
            text run at (0,20) width 40: "xx"
        LayoutText {#text} at (40,20) size 60x20
          text run at (40,20) width 60: " xx"
        LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 40x20 [bgcolor=#FF0000]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,40) size 40x20
            text run at (0,40) width 40: "xx"
        LayoutText {#text} at (40,40) size 60x20
          text run at (40,40) width 60: " xx"
